data.title: A Main Seize + Raze Paint Shells Combo
data.description: Use this early round A Main Seize + Paint Shells combo to get picks early in the round by catching enemy players who attempt to push through A Main quickly off guard, while also creating a window of opportunity that your team can use to gain an advantage when contesting A Main. You can also combo this with other utility that can work in combination with your Seize ability.

data.title: C Site Chokepoint Delay / Site Hold Haunt
data.description: Use this Chokepoint Delay / Site Hold Haunt to defend C Site from Attackers pushing through the C Main / C Site Chokepoint.

data.title: Early Round A Main Haunt
data.description: .Here's a simple, but effective early round A Main Haunt.
